content.question: Which of the following best describes the phrase structure of this except?

choices.label: A contrasting period with a half cadence in measure 4 and an authentic cadence in measure 8
A contrasting period with an authentic cadence in measure 4 and an authentic cadence in measure 8
A parallel period with a half cadence in measure 4 and an authentic cadence in measure 8
A parallel period with an authentic cadence in measure 4 and an authentic cadence in measure 8

content.answer: A parallel period with a half cadence in measure 4 and an authentic cadence in measure 8

skill.text: Skill 2.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in notated music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
